activities: Recommind provides electronic discovery and compliance software, technical and 	consulting services. Under the direction of our clients, Recommind receives and processes electronically stored information. Some of this data may contain personal information of our customers’ employee, partners or any other third party with which our customers may communicate. In this data processor role, Recommind also hosts the data on behalf of our clients for their access for document review related to litigation, internal or governmental investigation or similar legal matters.  Personal 	information transferred to the United States may either be held in a secure storage 	location for preservation purposes or is processed as described above.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner
